DOC.brief_title: A Behavioral Intervention Improve Work Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: This study design test whether systematic work performance feedback weekly goal setting , combine small reward give goal achievement , lead improved vocational , health , quality life outcome veteran enrol various work service program medical center . The long-term goal project determine effectiveness intervention medical center use experience multi-site cooperative study proposal . Research Design Methods : One hundred fifty subject accept work service medical center randomly assign one two condition : Work Feedback Small Rewards , Usual Services . In Work Feedback Small Rewards condition , participant attend weekly worker meet receive specific feedback base upon Work Behavior Inventory set weekly goal . They also receive small reward goal achievement equal $ 10 per month . Participants Usual Services condition get specific work feedback receive usual work service normally provide . They also receive $ 10 per month active participation . Assessments include baseline evaluation mental physical health , social function , cognitive function , quality life . Evaluations mental health , quality life , job satisfaction occur two month four month . Six-month twelve month evaluation repeat baseline assessment . Outcome measure include biweekly work performance assessment , vocational outcome , mental physical health status , social cognitive function , quality life
